AnnualCrop.description: Crop management details and events for annual crops.

burningEvent.description: A burning event, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
burningEvent.title: burningEvent

fertilizerEvents.description: A list of fertilizer events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
fertilizerEvents.title: fertilizerEvents

grazingEvents.description: A list of grazing events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
grazingEvents.title: grazingEvents

harvestEvents.description:
A list of harvest events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.

Straw / Stover harvest exception: If the hay or stover was removed
separately after grain / fruit / tuber harvest, do NOT add this as
a second harvest. Instead, enter the percent of the remaining residue
that was removed on the grain harvest, regardless of removal date.
harvestEvents.title: harvestEvents

irrigationEvents.description: A list of irrigation events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
irrigationEvents.title: irrigationEvents

killEvent.description: A kill event, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be excluded.
killEvent.title: killEvent

limingEvents.description: A list of liming events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null. During quantification, liming events are aggregated into a single event.
limingEvents.title: limingEvents

name.description:
The name of the crop.

You can find a list of accepted crops [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).
name.title: name

organicMatterEvents.description: A list of organic matter and manure application events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
organicMatterEvents.title: organicMatterEvents

plantingDate.description:
The date the crop was planted (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).

If a crop is ever replanted, define the crop again and add it to a new `CropYear` object with the new `plantingYear`.
plantingDate.title: plantingDate

soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.description:
A list of soil or crop disturbance events events, if applicable (such as tillage or termination events). When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.

All crops will need to define a soil or crop disturbance event <= the associated `plantingDate`.
soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.title: soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents

type.description:
The crop type.

You can find a list of acceptable crop types per crop `name` [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).
type.title: type

AnnualCrop.title: AnnualCrop

AnnualCropHarvestEvent.description: An annual crop's harvest event details.

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

grainFruitTuber.description: Whether the crop was harvest for grain, fruit or tuber.
grainFruitTuber.title: grainFruitTuber

yield.description:
The crop yield.

The current version of quantification does not consider yield when producing estimates. As such, we will default to 0 when left out.
yield.title: yield

yieldUnit.description:
The crop yield units.

The current version of quantification does not consider yield when producing estimates.
yieldUnit.title: yieldUnit

AnnualCropHarvestEvent.title: AnnualCropHarvestEvent

type.description: The type of burning, if applicable.
type.title: type

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

grainFruitTuber.description: Whether the crop was harvest for grain, fruit or tuber.
grainFruitTuber.title: grainFruitTuber

CropYear.description: Crop management details grouped by a planting year.

crops.description: A list of crops for a given planting year.
crops.title: crops

plantingYear.description: The planting year that the herein defined `crops` property is associated with. Note that a requirement to run quantification is that all crop management practices be mapped to a particular planting year as early as year 2000.
plantingYear.title: plantingYear

CropYear.title: CropYear

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

lbsOfNPerAcre.description: Amount of nitrogen applied in lbs/ac.
lbsOfNPerAcre.title: lbsOfNPerAcre

productName.description: The name/alias that the fertilizer is known by. This property is used in the to-be-deprecated supplier intake sheet.
productName.title: productName

type.description:
The fertilizer classification type.

Note that the fertilizer type does not currently impact quantification as it only impacts n2o emissions. As such, we default the type to "mixed blends" when this property is excluded/nulled.
type.title: type

Field.description: A field defining annual crop management practices. Fields are defined by geographic boundaries that contain crop management practices that are identical across the whole of that boundary.

acres.description: The number of acres that use the herein defined crop management practices (via [cropYears](#cropYears)).
acres.title: acres

cropYears.description: A list of crop management details grouped by the crop planting year.
cropYears.title: cropYears

geojson.description:
The geographic boundaries (defined as GeoJSON) associated with crop management practices.

For additional guidance and limitation of boundary files, [refer to the FAQ here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vnJKwFzU6drCjTD-eVXUK_59togcmROliyOU1y8Ne1U/edit?ts=5ed8f2d1#heading=h.fbiiknhrzhg8)
geojson.title: geojson

historicLangManagement.description: Details surrounding how the field was managed before year 2000.
historicLangManagement.title: historicLangManagement

regenerativeStartYear.description:
Year of practice switch - there can be more than one. We tend to use the earliest one that is after 2010 and meets our verification requirements.

For more information on how to select a start year see [here](https://go.nori.com/years).
regenerativeStartYear.title: regenerativeStartYear

Field.title: Field

GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.description:
A feature object which contains a geometry and associated properties.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2

bbox.description:
Bounding box of the coordinate range of the object's Geometries, Features, or Feature Collections.
The value of the bbox member is an array of length 2*n where n is the number of dimensions
represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point
followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point.
The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5
bbox.title: bbox

id.description:
A value that uniquely identifies this feature in a
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2.
id.title: id

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.
type.title: type

GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.title: GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.GeoJsonProperties>

coordinates.description:
A Position is an array of coordinates.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.1.1
Array should contain between two and three elements.
The previous GeoJSON specification allowed more elements (e.g., which could be used to represent M values),
but the current specification only allows X, Y, and (optionally) Z to be defined.
coordinates.title: coordinates

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.
type.title: type

represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point
followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point.
The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5

endDate.description: The last date that the event occurred (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
endDate.title: endDate

restPeriod.description: The grazing rest period in days.
restPeriod.title: restPeriod

startDate.description: The first date that the event occurred (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
startDate.title: startDate

utilization.description: The percentage of forage consumed by the animals.
utilization.title: utilization

HistoricCRPLandManagement.description:
Details surrounding how the field was managed before year 2000

Note that the state the field exists within restricts the allowed values per object property.

crp.description: Whether the field participated in CRP or not.
crp.title: crp

crpType.description: The type of CRP the field participated in. Only applicable if `crp` is set to yes.
crpType.title: crpType

postCRPManagement.description: How was the field managed after CRP
postCRPManagement.title: postCRPManagement

postCRPTillage.description: How was the field managed after tillage
postCRPTillage.title: postCRPTillage

preCRPManagement.description: How was the field managed before the field entered into CRP
preCRPManagement.title: preCRPManagement

preCRPTillage.description: How was the field tilled before the field entered into CRP
preCRPTillage.title: preCRPTillage

preYear1980.description: A description of how the land was managed before 1980.
preYear1980.title: preYear1980

HistoricCRPLandManagement.title: HistoricCRPLandManagement

HistoricNonCRPLandManagement.description: Land management details for when a field did not participate in CRP

crp.description: Whether the field participated in CRP or not.
crp.title: crp

preYear1980.description: A description of how the land was managed before 1980.
preYear1980.title: preYear1980

tillageForYears1980To2000.description: The type of soil or crop disturbance events used on the field between 1980 and 2000.
tillageForYears1980To2000.title: tillageForYears1980To2000

year1980To2000.description: A description of how the land was managed between 1980 and 2000.
enum: irrigated: annual crops with hay/pasture in rotation
non-irrigated: annual crops with hay/pasture in rotation
year1980To2000.title: year1980To2000

HistoricNonCRPLandManagement.title: HistoricNonCRPLandManagement

depth.description: The irrigation depth in inches. This should be set to 0 if it was applied at the surface.
depth.title: depth

endDate.description: The last date that the event occurred (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
endDate.title: endDate

frequency.description: The frequency that irrigation occurred. For example, if irrigation was applied once per week, then frequency would be set to 7.
frequency.title: frequency

startDate.description: The first date that the event occurred (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
startDate.title: startDate

volume.description: The irrigation volume in inches. If volume is 0, simply do not define an irrigation event.
volume.title: volume

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

date.description: The date that the liming occurred. Currently, liming dates do not impact quantification. As such, we will default to a reasonable date when this property is left out.
date.title: date

tonsPerAcre.description: The liming amount (in tons per acre).
tonsPerAcre.title: tonsPerAcre

OrchardOrVineyardCrop.description: Crop management details and events for orchard and vineyard crops.

burningEvent.description: A burning event, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
burningEvent.title: burningEvent

fertilizerEvents.description: A list of fertilizer events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
fertilizerEvents.title: fertilizerEvents

grazingEvents.description: A list of grazing events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
grazingEvents.title: grazingEvents

harvestEvents.description:
A list of harvest events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.

Straw / Stover harvest exception: If the hay or stover was removed
separately after grain / fruit / tuber harvest, do NOT add this as
a second harvest. Instead, enter the percent of the remaining residue
that was removed on the grain harvest, regardless of removal date.
harvestEvents.title: harvestEvents

irrigationEvents.description: A list of irrigation events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
irrigationEvents.title: irrigationEvents

killEvent.description: A kill event, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be excluded.
killEvent.title: killEvent

limingEvents.description: A list of liming events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null. During quantification, liming events are aggregated into a single event.
limingEvents.title: limingEvents

organicMatterEvents.description: A list of organic matter and manure application events, if applicable. When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.
organicMatterEvents.title: organicMatterEvents

plantingDate.description:
The date the crop was planted (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).

If a crop is ever replanted, define the crop again and add it to a new `CropYear` object with the new `plantingYear`.
plantingDate.title: plantingDate

prune.description: Indicates if the crop was pruned.
prune.title: prune

renewOrClear.description: Indicates if the crop was renewed or cleared.
renewOrClear.title: renewOrClear

soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.description:
A list of soil or crop disturbance events events, if applicable (such as tillage or termination events). When it is not applicable it can be defined as null.

All crops will need to define a soil or crop disturbance event <= the associated `plantingDate`.
soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.title: soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents

type.description:
The crop type.

You can find a list of acceptable crop types per crop `name` [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).

Note: if a crop ever changes types during the lifetime of the field (i.e. From an annual crop to a perennial), define the crop as a new crop in the a new `CropYear` object and assign it the `plantingYear` that the crop switched types. In addition, if the crop is switching types, a harvest or kill event must be defined to signal the end of the life of this crop being the initial crop `type`.
type.title: type

OrchardOrVineyardCrop.title: OrchardOrVineyardCrop

OrganicMatterEvent.description: Organic matter (OMAD) and manure event details.

amountPerAcre.description: Amount of organic matter or manure applied per acre.
amountPerAcre.title: amountPerAcre

anyOf.description:
The carbon to nitrogen ratio in the organic matter or manure.

You can find a list of default values per `type` [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

name.description: The name/alias that the OMAD event is known by. This property is used in the to-be-deprecated supplier intake sheet.
name.title: name

anyOf.description:
The nitrogen percent makeup in the organic matter or manure.

You can find a list of default values per `type` [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).

type.description: The organic matter or manure classification type.
type.title: type

Project.description: A supplier project entity which encapsulates a set of fields. This top-level interface defines all necessary properties for a supplier project created manually or via a data import file.

fields.description: An array of fields defining annual crop management practices.
fields.title: fields

version.description: The specification version. This information is used to determine the logic Nori uses to import a project
version.title: version

Project.title: Project

SoilOrCropDisturbanceEvent.description: Soil or crop disturbance event event details.

date.description: The date the crop event happened (formatted as MM/DD/YYYY and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).
date.title: date

name.description: The name/alias that the soil or crop disturbance events practice is known by. This property is used in the to-be-deprecated supplier intake sheet.
name.title: name

type.description:
The soil or crop disturbance events classification type.

You can find a list of common equivalents [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).
type.title: type
